      • placeDie

        public void placeDie(Point p,
                     Die die)
              throws PlacementException,
                     IllegalMoveTurnException
        this method places a die in a point of the chosen window pattern of the player. it will check all constrictions following the game's rules.
        Parameters:
        p - the point where the die should be placed
        die - the die that should be placed
        Throws:
        PlacementException - if the die can't placed in the point p
        IllegalMoveTurnException - if it's not this player's turn.

      • placeDie

        public void placeDie(int x,
                     int y,
                     Die die)
              throws GameMoveException
        this method places a die in a point of the chosen window pattern of the player. it will check all constrictions following the game's rules.
        Parameters:
        x - the first coordinate of the point where the die should be placed
        y - the second coordinate of the point where the die should be placed
        die - the die that should be placed
        Throws:
        GameMoveException - if the die can't placed in the point p
        NotValidDieException - if the coordinates are not valid.
